Reviews.Title: Android will kill the feature phone
Reviews.Author: SunyJim
Reviews.Content: This is not a North American phone, they are sold in UK, Germany, India, Hong Kong.The phone is multiband GSM so works with GSM carriers (Rogers and Fido in Canada, T-Mobile and some others in USA) I bought this to replace a simple flip phone, that I use as a phone and sometimes to text. It's small, battery is good, screen is way bigger than my old KRZR K1, so I'm really happy. Wi-fi is fantastic bonus for Facebook, email, google messenger, etc when i'm at home or at the coffee shop. GPS works great. Phone is fast and very responsive. Camera is just 2MP fixed focus, but takes good enough point and shoot pictures.If you are buying this for data, keep in mind it will do EDGE, but not 3G, this is a foreign market the 3G is HSDPA 900 / 2100. It uses different frequencies than North America for 3G (hardware based, not changeable) so that doesn't work here.

Reviews.Title: Small and handy
Reviews.Author: Yuval
Reviews.Content: It is a small galaxy that fits into my pocket (hence the name)Camera is low than avarage but I do not need it so it is oKAs it is not the strongest in the world it should be well managedlike closing applications and make sure you do only one thing at a timeAndroid is greate so all inall it is a nice and good phone that comes at low price

Reviews.Title: Lucky Choice
Reviews.Author: S D Bradbury
Reviews.Content: Purpose was having a device when needed in international tourism travel, without being tied to a vendor or service company. Considered a "world phone package" company, but concluded I could do what I needed on my own and have less expensive calls and data with locally purchased SIM cards; not to mention obtain a smartphone for the purpose at a great low price.Exceeded my best expectations - pre-delivery phone call to Breed with technical question on device promptly answered; surprisingly quick delivery; packaging secure; easy set-up; instructions clear (ENG); internet/email/GPS operates well on Wi-Fi without SIM Card installed; phone with pre-paid SIM Card just fine. During much Int'l travel time will use without SIM inserted on Wi-Fi for FREE net use - no complaints from the device, and no reason to burn cash on SIM Card even when using low-cost in-country cards.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone for the Price
Reviews.Author: James Cauthen
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone expecting Android 2.3, surprisingly it came with Android 4.04, a definite plus.  I bought it for its size so I could easily slip it into my pocket and it does that just fine.  It has good wifi capability and the built in radio works nicely.  So far I have had only one problem, it did lock up once and refused to power down - I removed the battery, put it back in, powered it on and it has worked fine since.  I replaced a t-mobile dumb phone and simply transferred the sim card to this phone with no problems.  If you want this phone for mobile data, with t-mobile it will operate no faster than edge.  I don't know how it works with AT&T.;  I don't use it for mobile data, satisfied with using wi-fi for data as spouse has a data plan on her phone.  This phone has acceptable, but not great, speed - enough for my purposes.

Reviews.Title: Just perfect
Reviews.Author: Martha Barrantes Prado
Reviews.Content: I love IT ! It's just i looking for. It's small And functional with my pone company. And GPS it's perfect for me.

Reviews.Title: Big things come in small packages!
Reviews.Author: suni
Reviews.Content: I just received this LITTLE phone yesterday.  I went from a blackberry to this very easy to set-up phone.  Quick easy to use....bluetooth was a breeze to set up.  I did not like the charger it was very flimsy and did not work.  Had to charge my new phone with my charger from my blackberry, that's why four (4) stars.Well, so far so good.  I know it is a bit early to review, but if there is a problem I will review later.The seller is GREAT, got here on time.

Reviews.Title: Fulfills my basic functions
Reviews.Author: L.Pink
Reviews.Content: The phone seems to have a ton of features, but I haven't been able to utilize most of them; but so far, I've been able to make clear calls,send and receive regular and vivid picture texts. When I find the time will read the manual, so I can try to maximize its full potential. One major draw back, is the fact that the screen is very small, I know it had said "pocket," but was looking for something a bit bigger.With this issue, it makes it a bit difficult to write texts, as the keys are so small and close together; when pressing the keys, I find that the wrong ones populate, which makes me have to go back and erase and that takes up a bit of my time.I will continue to use so I can see if this improves.

Reviews.Title: just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Daniel Franco
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, just what I wanted, simplicity and functionality, good speed Wifi connection and Android have many applications I can download .. internal memory a bit limited but you can place a large capacity MicroSD

Reviews.Title: Cute phone
Reviews.Author: Leticia
Reviews.Content: I like this phone, but sometimes the touch pad on the bottom does not work so I have to turn the screen off and the on in order for it to work. Overall, I like it because it's small which means that I won't break it for a long time and I also use it as an Ipod when I go for a run. Very versatile.

Reviews.Title: simplemente excelente
Reviews.Author: Rommel
Reviews.Content: soy de Venezuela compre 2 de este modelo es totalmente perfecto pequeño y poderoso, funciona totalmente con movistar venezuela, totalmente compatible lo recomiendo 100%, y el vendedor es seguro y confiable sin problemas toda la negociacion

Reviews.Title: Nice product
Reviews.Author: Veronica D. Gruber B
Reviews.Content: The product came to venezuela in perfect condition and was almost everything they said, just a few inconvenients like a 3G here in venezuela with Movilnet didn't work because the bands and I didn't know the cellphone was european must accurate Italian and that implicate the charger is in 220 V but for me are only few problems, The product is great and I very happy with it

Reviews.Title: Still determining value of purchase
Reviews.Author: CT Red
Reviews.Content: Still learning how to use the phone. Purchased for a trip overseas - will know in a couple of weeks whether or not it meets my needs. If so it will have been a great investment.  Cons - far too many apps included that cannot be uninstalled. Somewhat slow - a more powerful operating system would be preferred. Will post again following my travels.

Reviews.Title: Good phone, reasonable price
Reviews.Author: Roman
Reviews.Content: The phone is small. The quality is good. The camera is the weak part. But in general the quality and the price corespond with each other and i am happy with this purchace.

Reviews.Title: Great low-end smartphone
Reviews.Author: moonsammy
Reviews.Content: In spite of being a technophile, I've been very reluctant to purchase a smartphone. I prefer to use my actual computer for computing needs, plus I'm cheap. So until recently I'd been rocking an old slider / bar phone, and quite enjoyed the simplicity and long battery life (around 4-5 days between charges, but I'm also a minimal phone / text user). When shopping for an entry-level smartphone my priorities were small size, low price, and good battery life. This thing nails all three. It's actually slightly larger than I'd expected, but it's small enough to very easily fit into a pants or shirt pocket without being a nuisance. The very few things I use it for work well (calls, texting, email, music listening, flashlight, and timer), and when I went on a trip recently I watched a few movies on it and it was a decent experience. Anyone planning on watching movies: you'll need to convert them to 320x240 or the phone won't play them, I personally recommend "Miro Video Converter" for the task, just pick the Android->Samsung->Galaxy Mini setting.On the OS front, I had been expecting 2.3 based on the listing here, but it actually has 4.0.4, so that was a pleasant surprise.My only gripe with this device is the audio output - it works just fine, but is very quiet. Even at max volume I couldn't hear some things particularly well while riding a bus or subway, while with other devices this has never been a problem. If there's a way to crank up the output a little then I'd judge this phone to be perfect for my purposes.

Reviews.Title: OK as an entry-level phone
Reviews.Author: Freezerburn
Reviews.Content: Several months no problems at all. A bit basic, but that was expected. It does its job well. OK as entry-level.

Reviews.Title: I love this phone
Reviews.Author: Reny Robertiz
Reviews.Content: when the phone arrive me i love it because be easy to drive and the application guau is the best

Reviews.Title: it's ok not worth the price tho
Reviews.Author: ruth peralta
Reviews.Content: i bought this phone because i needed a new phone and i saw this for a reasonable price. my plan is t-mobile and i thought it would work seeing that its "unlocked". the phone works fine but i cant receive pictures or send them which sucks.

Reviews.Title: Great cell phone!
Reviews.Author: Lbsf
Reviews.Content: The product arrived sealed before the maximum due date*****. It worked instantly on my home wi-fi after typing in the code*****. Works great on wi-fi but just a bit slower compared to my Galaxy S3; I didn't expect the phone to be just as fast anyway. I was delighted it included a USA electrical plug in adaptor*****. I'll update my review as necessary when I insert a SIM card.

Reviews.Title: comentarios
Reviews.Author: witremundo
Reviews.Content: acabo de recibir el celular, me gusta mucho, completo, un buen equipo, trae todo lo que se especifica el producto, soy de Venezuela y trabaja bien.

Reviews.Title: OJO MALA TIENDA
Reviews.Author: legnay
Reviews.Content: MAL VENDEDOR PEDI EL TELEFONO DE UN COLOR Y LLEGO DE OTRO Y PARA COMPLETAR EL CARGADOR LLEGO DESTROZADO  DAÑADO QUE DECEPCIÒN CON ESTA TIENDA NO LA RECOMIENDO
